name: Diagnio Middle East FZ-LLC
profile_description: Fast, easy and non-invasive ovulation home test.
apple_store_app_description:
Diagnio goes beyond typical cycle tracking. It's an innovative solution designed for the modern women. With Diagnio, not only can you track your menstrual cycle and ovulation, but also monitor your well-being through expert-curated assessments. This comprehensive approach gives you insights into your mental health and potential fertility-related concerns, offering a holistic view of your cycle health. Dive into personalized recommendations, and discover a better understanding of your cycle, body, and mind, all in one app.

Whether you're planning for a baby or simply seeking a holistic overview of your reproductive health, Diagnio is your trusted companion.

PREGNANCY PLANNING:

Efficiently navigate your path to conception. Diagnio's app gives you personalized fertility window predictions by analyzing factors like menstruation data, ovulation symptoms, stress, energy levels, and more. Know the right time to try for a baby and receive timely notifications and recommendations to conceive naturally faster.

REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH MONITORING:

Empower yourself with in-depth insights into your reproductive wellness. Track menstruation, cycle symptoms, stress, energy, intercourse, body measurements, and more. Diagnio offers a personalized diary, simplifying the process and ensuring you're well-equipped to make informed decisions about your health.

FEATURES:

- Period Tracker
- Cycle Analysis & Symptoms Tracker
- Stress & Anxiety Assessment
- Emotional Balance Assessment
- Diabetes Risk Assessment
- Body Energy level Assessment
- Personalized Recommendations
- Integration with Apple HealthKit: Sync your women’s health data with Diagnio’s calendar for seamless tracking and better predictions, utilizing the comprehensive data from Apple Health.

Diagnio Mobile Application is not a medical device and should not be treated as one. This is a wellness platform and period tracker for women. For any medical-related inquiries please consult with your doctor. Your personal data is completely safe with Diagnio and can only be shared with your permission.

apple_store_app_description:
Welcome to SnapnDash, your ultimate solution for all your photo and printing needs, right at your fingertips! Say goodbye to the hassle of traditional passport photos and phto booths and hello to the convenience of our innovative mobile app. Whether you’re printing your memories, snapping on-the-go, or in need of professional-grade passport photos, SnapnDash has got you covered.

Main Feature - “Photo for Document”:
SnapnDash’s standout feature is its revolutionary “photo for document” capability. With cutting-edge AI technology, our app automatically removes backgrounds from photos, ensuring they meet the strict requirements for passport photos. Say goodbye to the hassle of traditional passport photos – simply select or take your photo, and let SnapnDash do the rest.

name: Together We Empower FZ-LLC
profile_description: twe is learning-based social media app that redefining the way young individuals engage with the professional world.
apple_store_app_description:
Find the right opportunity for you. 

Meet +twe, the all-in-one app for students. 

+twe helps you browse through and apply to universities, scholarships, jobs, internships. 

+twe is your go-to platform for academic success and career growth. With AI-driven tools, gamified learning, and a dynamic social network, it’s built for students, young professionals, and educators.

Key Features of +twe   

1. Job and Internship Opportunities 
- Access part-time, or full-time jobs, and internship positions worldwide. 
- Use coins earned through gamified learning to apply. 
- Build practical experience with entry-level roles for students and recent graduates. 

2. University and Program Search 
- Explore universities globally, including rankings and course details. 
- Compare institutions to find your perfect academic match. 
- Gain insights into tuition costs, living expenses, and application requirements. 

3. Find Courses and Programs with Ease 
- Browse undergraduate and postgraduate courses.
- Make informed decisions about your future with detailed program descriptions. 
- Discover paths that align with your academic interests and career aspirations. 

4. Scholarships Finder 
- Connect with scholarship opportunities tailored to your profile. 
- Filter based on merit, need, and other unique criteria. 
- Reduce financial burdens and focus on your academic goals. 

6. Gamified Learning 
- Learn through fun activities like quizzes, questionnaires, and challenges. 
- Earn virtual coins and level up by completing learning tasks and modules. 
- Engage in daily and monthly challenges. 

7. Goal-Setting Tools 
- Set, edit, and track personal, academic, and career goals. 
- Organize tasks with descriptions, due dates, and completion milestones. 
- Stay motivated with features that make achieving goals a structured process. 

8. Vibrant Student and Professional Community 
- Join a global network of peers, mentors, and industry professionals. 
- Share knowledge and insights through posts, videos, and clips. 
- Build meaningful connections and stay updated on trending topics. 

9. Social Media and Content Creation 
- Express yourself with text posts, images, videos, and short clips. 
- Comment, share, and engage with others in a dynamic online space. 
- Use the messaging feature to connect one-on-one or in groups. 

Benefits of Using +twe 

Students: 
- Apply to internships, part-time and entry-level jobs. 
- Explore universities and programs.  
- Discover scholarships easily. 
- Stay productive with gamified learning and goal-setting tools. 
- Be part of the biggest student community.  

Professionals: 
- Find job opportunities that match your skills and aspirations. 
- Find jobs that suit you. 
- Network with peers and mentors to advance your career. 
- Participate in challenges to boost personal development. 

Educators: 
- Promote your university by showcasing your university's unique identity, vibrant community and academic offerings.  
- Connect with prospective students eager to learn more about your university.  
- Boost your brand visibility and increase enrollment.

Premium and Free Options 

+twe Student Basic (Free Plan): 
- Access job, university, program, and scholarship searches without limits. 
- Connect with students and young professionals on +twe. 
- Collect virtual coins through gamified learning and redeem them for exclusive opportunities. 
- Utilize goal-setting features, challenges, and basic gamified learning activities. 
- Apply to up to 10 opportunities per day. 
 
+twe Student Premium ($4.99/Month): 
- Includes everything in +twe Student Basic, plus:  
- Apply to jobs, universities, programs, and scholarships without daily limits. 
- Unlock advanced gamified learning features. 
- Earn up to 50 virtual coins monthly to apply through +twe and boost your applications. 
- Highlight your profile in the community with an exclusive premium badge.

apple_store_app_description:
Welcome to Unlimits — The World’s First AI Life Coach Built to Turn Dreams into Reality. 
If you’ve ever felt stuck, scattered, or unsure how to move forward with your goals—this app 
was built for you. 
As seen on TEDx. Trusted by thousands. Built for those who want more. 
Unlimits combines the power of AI coaching, emotional intelligence, and bold 
goal-setting to help you go from dreaming to doing. 
Whether you’re building a business, changing careers, improving your health, or just seeking 
clarity in life—Unlimits is your personal, always-on thinking partner. 
How It Works 
Unlimits uses cutting-edge AI to understand your dreams, challenges, and mindset—then 
guides you with powerful coaching questions, personalized goal plans, and actionable 
micro-wins. You’ll move from vague ideas to vivid dreams to real-world results in 3 simple steps. 
DREAM: Reconnect With What Matters 
● Create your Dream in vivid clarity 
● Move past doubt and confusion with clarity-boosting reflection 
● Get a personalized roadmap aligned to who you really are. 
MANIFEST: Bring Your Dream to Life 
● Step into a movie of your dream fully achieved. 
● The Unlimits Advisor prompts and nudges you to move past overthinking, 
perfectionism, and fear 
● Build emotional momentum with daily check-ins and micro-wins 
ACHIEVE: Track Progress. Build Flow. 
● Gain traction with XP streaks, milestones, and habit rituals 
● Celebrate real transformation, not vanity metrics 
● Stay accountable with personalized reflections, action prompts, and your own rhythm 
Your Personal AI Coach, Reimagined 
Unlimits adapts to your energy, behavior, and mindset: 
● Feeling stuck? It nudges. 
● Feeling overwhelmed? It simplifies. 
● Feeling ready? It accelerates. 
This is a coach that listens. That learns you. That walks beside you. 
More Than a Goal Tracker. A Life Transformer. 
Unlimits isn’t just another productivity app. It’s a breakthrough system that helps you: 
● Reconnect with your boldest dream. 
● Break it down into quarterly goals and weekly micro-wins 
● Stay emotionally aligned through real-time AI coaching 
● Build daily momentum with streaks, nudges, and accountability 
● Move from overthinking to clear, confident action 
What You Can Do With Unlimits 
● Dream Builder – Design a vivid future with guided clarity 
● Manifest vividly - Visualize your dream, already achieved. 
● Goal Engine – Translate dreams into trackable, achievable targets 
● AI Coach & Advisor  – Personalized support that adapts to your mindset 
● Momentum Tracker – Visualize your progress and build winning habits 
● Emotional Nudges – Stay on track when doubt or burnout hits 
● XP & Streaks – Gamify your journey and stay accountable 
Why Unlimits Works 
We’ve coached thousands of entrepreneurs, leaders, and dreamers—and we realized 
something: 
Most people don’t need more motivation. They need clarity, alignment, and a coach who gets 
how they move through the world. 
That’s exactly what Unlimits delivers—with soul, science, and simplicity. 
Who It’s For 
● Creators, founders, and professionals building a life of purpose 
● Visionaries ready to take control of their future 
● Dreamers tired of waiting, and doers seeking momentum 
● Anyone ready to turn “someday” into right now 
Unlimits Is a Movement. Not Just an App. 
We’re here to democratize success, purpose, and personal growth. 
To help more people dream bigger—and actually get there. 
To make the impossible possible, one micro-win at a time. 
Don’t just chase your goals. Design a life you can’t wait to wake up to. 
Download Unlimits today—and start your next chapter.

play_store_app_description:
Experience Unforgettable Moments with Vizoly!

Key Features of Vizoly:

Discover and Book Services: Browse through a vast range of services, from beauty treatments and wellness to adventure tours and car rentals. Vizoly offers the best prices, helping you save while enjoying top-quality experiences.

User-Generated Videos: Watch real feedback from users through videos they’ve created. Whether it’s a spa day or an adventure tour, you can get a true sense of what to expect with authentic user content.

Interactive Maps: Locate services near you with our detailed, user-friendly maps. Find the best deals and services close to you, making it easy to plan your day.

Real-Time Booking Tracking: Stay updated on your bookings from start to finish. Vizoly’s real-time tracking feature ensures you’re informed every step of the way, making the booking process smooth and stress-free.

Secure Payments: Pay safely through multiple secure payment methods, including Stripe, for complete peace of mind. Vizoly guarantees a secure and reliable transaction process every time.

Personalized Recommendations: Based on your preferences and past bookings, Vizoly recommends services and experiences tailored specifically for you. Whether you seek adventure or relaxation, Vizoly has something to suit your needs.

Reviews & Feedback: After enjoying your service, share your experience with the community. Leave written reviews or upload a video to help others make informed choices. Join a vibrant and supportive community where feedback helps improve everyone's experience.

Why Choose Vizoly?

Best Prices in the UAE: With a lowest-price guarantee, Vizoly ensures you’re getting the best deal. Whether you’re booking a car, scheduling a beauty treatment, or planning a thrilling experience, rest assured you’re getting the lowest price available.

Dynamic Community: Vizoly is more than just a booking app; it’s a community. Discover services through real reviews and engaging video content shared by other users, making the decision process easier.

Seamless Booking Experience: From discovery to booking, Vizoly provides a smooth and user-friendly experience. Our intuitive app makes it easy to find the services you need and book them in just a few minutes.

Diverse Service Offerings: Whether you need a driver for the day, a spa treatment, or a fitness class, Vizoly covers it all. We cater to all interests and needs, ensuring there’s something for everyone.

Track Your Bookings: Stay on top of your reservations with Vizoly’s advanced tracking system. Get real-time updates on your bookings, and receive notifications and reminders, so you never miss an appointment.

Customizable Profiles: Personalize your Vizoly experience by managing your profile and booking history. Save favorite services for quick access, and manage upcoming reservations with ease.

Trusted Service Providers: We work with only the best professionals in the industry. All service providers are vetted for quality and professionalism, ensuring you receive top-notch service every time.

Support Local Businesses: Vizoly not only connects you with services but also supports local businesses by giving them a platform to reach more customers. By booking through Vizoly, you’re helping entrepreneurs and local businesses thrive.

Exclusive Offers: Get access to exclusive offers and deals available only on Vizoly. We work closely with top service providers to bring you unique discounts and unbeatable prices.

Multilingual Support: Vizoly is designed for a global audience, with support for multiple languages to ensure everyone can easily navigate and find services.

Create Unforgettable Memories: Vizoly is dedicated to helping you create memorable moments. Whether it’s a family outing, a day of relaxation, or an exciting adventure, Vizoly connects you with experiences that will leave lasting memories.

Join Vizoly Today!

Download Vizoly now and start creating unforgettable moments today!

GulfKaam: Your Pathway to Blue-Collar Jobs in the Middle East


Are you looking for Construction, Oil & Gas, MEP, Marine, Facility management jobs in the Gulf countries? Gulfkaam is the solution! Create your profile in seconds, get verified and let the best employer find your profile.


Why choose GulfKaam?

·         Multi Language support: Create your profile in English, Hindi, Bengali, Malayalam or 12 different regional languages. Now language is not a barrier to find a job in Dubai or Saudi Arabia.

·         Intelligent ‘Job to Profile’ matching: Companies looking for people with your skill set will find your profile through our smart auto matching systems. Also you will get notified about all the latest job opportunities in the Gulf Countries.

·         Get verified: Get verified for free! You will get verified by Gulfkaam team which increases your chance of getting recruited by top companies in GCC.

·         30 second CV Creation: Create your CV using our proprietary voice to text conversion technology with-in 30 second. Yes, just talk to the app and create a CV.

 

GulfKaam’s Magic (How GulfKaam works)

·         Create your 30 second CV.

·         Get verified for free.

·         No need to apply daily: Our intelligent job matching system ranks your profile to the best companies in the gulf.

·         Get interviewed by the companies and fly out for your new dream job.

 

What jobs can you find on GulfKaam:

You can find all skilled blue-collar jobs from Dubai, Saudi, Qatar and other Gulf countries in GulfKaam. For instance:

·         Construction/Civil (Painter, Carpenter, Mason, Foreman and more)

·         MEP (Mechanic, Electrician, Plumber, Fitter and more)

·         Oil & Gas (Rigger, Digging operator, Helper and more)

·         Welder (3G Welder, 6G Welder, ARC Welder, MIG Welder and more)

·         Maritime (Vessel cleaner, Marine mechanic, Deckhand and more)

·         Helper (General Helper, Mechanical Helper, Civil Helper, Mason Helper)

And more.


Join GulfKaam today, get verified for free and discover how easy it is to find a job in the Gulf Countries. Already more than 10,000 + blue-collars have installed GulfKaam app to find their dream jobs in the Middle East.

 

DOWNLOAD GULFKAAM – Where opportunity meets skill sets.
